import React,{ Component } from 'react'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {ColoredButtons} from '../../components/button' import Header from '../../components/navbar' import './index.scss' class Login extends Component{ state={ email:'', password:'' } onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); } handleInputFields(key,values,index){} render(){ return(
{/*
Welcome back to IM Dashboard.
Please Login to your account.
Learn More
this.handleInputFields('email', e.target.value)} /> this.handleInputFields('password', e.target.value)} />
ingat saya Lupa Kata Sandi?
Masuk Ke Dashboard Masuk Dengan Google
*/}
SMS Push Notification Web Pop Up eMail
Please login to your account
this.handleInputFields('email', e.target.value)} /> this.handleInputFields('password', e.target.value)} />
); } } export default Login;
